name: Chickpea Kabocha Fries. Vegan Glutenfree Recipe Fat-free option
description: Chickpea kabocha fries. Chickpea flour fries made with a batter of chickpea flour and roasted squash + spices. Baked, fried or grilled fries! Gluten-free Vegan Recipe.  Makes 14-18 fries
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup Chickpea flour (besan/garbanzo bean flour. You can also use garbanzo-fava bean flour)
1/3  cup well mashed roasted Kabocha squash (or any other squash or 1/3 cup mashed sweet potato)
1/2 tsp ranch seasoning (Garlic, Onion, Dill, Parsley, Chives and a touch of Pepper. or other spices of choice))

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl or directly in the pan, add all the ingredients and whisk.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl or directly in the pan, add all the ingredients and whisk.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the pan on low-medium heat and keep whisking to combine all the ingredients.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat the pan on low-medium heat and keep whisking to combine all the ingredients.

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk for 4-6 minutes until the batter starts get thick and stiff. You will be able to feel the stiffness and the batter will not move easily.
recipeInstructions.name: Whisk for 4-6 minutes until the batter starts get thick and stiff. You will be able to feel the stiffness and the batter will not move easily.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop the stiff batter onto parchment or greased sheet. Spread the batter quickly using a greased spatula keeping it 1/4-1/2 inch thick and let set for an hour in refrigerator.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop the stiff batter onto parchment or greased sheet. Spread the batter quickly using a greased spatula keeping it 1/4-1/2 inch thick and let set for an hour in refrigerator.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the set batter into strips. (At this point, the strips can be frozen. Thaw and proceed to grill/bake.)
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the set batter into strips. (At this point, the strips can be frozen. Thaw and proceed to grill/bake.)

recipeInstructions.text: Then either bake or pan fry or grill. Brush a little oil on the fries to grill.
recipeInstructions.name: Then either bake or pan fry or grill. Brush a little oil on the fries to grill.

recipeInstructions.text: Pan fry for 2-3 minutes each side on medium-high heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Pan fry for 2-3 minutes each side on medium-high heat.

recipeInstructions.text: For Baked: Broil on Low for 4-5 minutes then broil on High for half a minute to a minute(depends on how crisp you want the fries). The fries can be baked or grilled without oil too.
recipeInstructions.name: For Baked: Broil on Low for 4-5 minutes then broil on High for half a minute to a minute(depends on how crisp you want the fries). The fries can be baked or grilled without oil too.

recipeInstructions.text: I sprinkled some cajun spice on them and served with sriracha.
recipeInstructions.name: I sprinkled some cajun spice on them and served with sriracha.
